task: Identify highly variable genes using the Seurat method and subset the normalized data to only these genes. Use n_top_genes=2000. Return a JSON object with fields: n_vars_before (number of genes before HVG selection), n_vars_after (number of genes after subsetting to HVGs), hvg_retention_rate (fraction of genes retained: n_vars_after/n_vars_before), n_obs (number of observations/beads, should remain unchanged).
